gold.user: Admin user requesting all code security configurations for the enterprise.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all code security configurations associated with the specified enterprise.

gold.user: Security officer creating a new code security configuration for the enterprise.
gold.ideal: Creates a new code security configuration and returns the details of the created configuration.

gold.user: Compliance manager checking the default code security configurations for the enterprise.
gold.ideal: Returns the default code security configurations set for the enterprise.

gold.user: Developer retrieving details of a specific code security configuration.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified code security configuration.

gold.user: Admin updating the existing code security configuration.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified code security configuration and returns the updated configuration.

gold.user: Admin deleting an obsolete code security configuration.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified code security configuration and confirms deletion.

gold.user: Security officer attaching a configuration to a repository.
gold.ideal: Attaches the specified configuration to the repository and returns the status.

gold.user: Admin setting a configuration as the default for the enterprise.
gold.ideal: Sets the specified configuration as the default and returns the updated default configuration.

gold.user: Developer checking which repositories are using a specific configuration.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of repositories associated with the specified code security configuration.

gold.user: Org admin retrieving all code security configurations for the organization.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all code security configurations associated with the specified organization.

gold.user: Security officer creating a new code security configuration for the organization.
gold.ideal: Creates a new code security configuration and returns the details of the created configuration.

gold.user: Compliance manager checking the default code security configurations for the organization.
gold.ideal: Returns the default code security configurations set for the organization.

gold.user: Admin detaching a configuration from a repository.
gold.ideal: Detaches the specified configuration from the repository and confirms detachment.

gold.user: Developer retrieving details of a specific code security configuration.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified code security configuration.

gold.user: Admin updating the existing code security configuration.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified code security configuration and returns the updated configuration.

gold.user: Admin deleting an obsolete code security configuration.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified code security configuration and confirms deletion.

gold.user: Security officer attaching a configuration to a repository.
gold.ideal: Attaches the specified configuration to the repository and returns the status.

gold.user: Admin setting a configuration as the default for the organization.
gold.ideal: Sets the specified configuration as the default and returns the updated default configuration.

gold.user: Developer checking which repositories are using a specific configuration.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of repositories associated with the specified code security configuration.

gold.user: Developer retrieving the code security configuration for a specific repository.
gold.ideal: Returns the code security configuration associated with the specified repository.
